nodes.text: Assault on the Imperial weapons factory

During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, a Jedi Knight attacked an Imperial weapons factory in the Lower Industrial Sector of Nar Shaddaa in hopes of shutting down the Power Guard Project, which had been seized by the Sith Lord Sadic. However, the Knight instead found Agent Galen of the Republic Strategic Information Service, who had been captured while searching for the project and transformed into a Power Guard. The Jedi managed to defeat Galen and convince him to overcome his programming and aid in the fight, and the agent joined the Knight in attacking Sadic's laboratory.
